valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 16 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 17 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: New high expected Fair Isle 1028 by midday tomorrow. High Malin 1029 dissipating

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly 4 or 5, becoming variable 3 or less later. In east, northwesterly veering northerly, 4 to 6, decreasing 2 to 4 later.
Sea state
In west, moderate. in east, moderate, occasionally rough at first.
Weather
Showers.
Visibility
Good.
